## Installation
The FINEMAP-MISS R package can be installed using the following command in R.

```{r install, eval = F}
# install.packages("devtools")  # Uncomment if devtools is not installed
devtools::install_github("JoonasKartau/FINEMAP-MISS")
```

## Example run

In the vignettes folder in the GitHub repository, an example of fine-mapping
with FINEMAP-MISS is provided.
